---
title: "Tech Report Title"
date: "`r format(Sys.Date(), '%B, %Y')`"
output: 
  ratlas::techreport_pdf:
    template: inst/rmarkdown/templates/techreport/resources/template.tex
    latex_engine: xelatex
    citation_package: biblatex
    keep_tex: yes
bibliography: ["bib/refs.bib", "bib/packages.bib"]
biblio-style: apalike2
csl: csl/apa.csl
link-citations: yes
lot: true
lof: true
subparagraph: yes
mainfont: Palatino LT Std
fontsize: 11pt
acknowledgements: >
  `r if(knitr::is_latex_output()) jayhawkdown::inc("front-matter/preface.Rmd")`
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
needed_packages <- c("ratlas", "knitr", "english", "tidyverse")
load_packages <- function(x) {
  if (!(x %in% installed.packages())) {
    install.packages(x, repos = "https://cran.rstudio.com/")
  }
  
  suppressPackageStartupMessages(require(x, character.only = TRUE))
}
vapply(needed_packages, load_packages, logical(1))
```

)
